title: Enhancing Clinical Competencies in Healthcare Practice: Short-Intensive Course on Strengthening Ethical Competencies in Genomic Testing

context.prior_knowledge: Basic genomics knowledge and foundational understanding of clinical laboratory practices
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Analyze and discuss ethical dilemmas related to genetic testing through three or more scenario-based approaches.
Resolve communication issues that may arise when conveying genetic information between patients and examiners using two or more strategies.
Apply an ethical decision-making framework that considers social context and personal emotions when interpreting genetic test results.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
